notesStmt.note: Dated 10 July 1000, in Pavia. Date given on line 11.
Incipit: In nomine sanctae ... Notum sit omnibus fidelibus.
Explicit: ... hanc paginam sigillare iussimus. Heribertus cancellarius vice petri cumani episcopi novit.

msIdentifier.institution: Van Pelt Library, University of Pennsylvania
msIdentifier.repository: Henry Charles Lea Library, Special Collections

msContents.summary: Diploma issued to Adam, son of Teutio. It takes Adam under imperial protection and gives him the right to live under Roman law.

msItem.title: Diploma issued to Adam, son of Teutio
msItem.author: Otto III, Holy Roman Emperor, 980-1002
Adam, son of Teutio

history.provenance: J. F. Böhmer, Die Regesten des Kaiserreiches unter Otto III, indicates that this diploma was once in the Archivio Magherini Graziani.
Purchased from L. Witten, New Haven, 1957.
